song_lyrics: Relo zākamzoḷ naval Rasiyā rang relo,
Khelo khoble bharī gulāl Swāmī rangrelo... °ṭek
Sārangpurmā utsav thāye, Rāṭhoḍ Dhādhal Harine teḍāve;
Puruṣhottam Prabhu khele Horī, Guṇātītānand sange jorī;
Sant sakhājan manḍaḷ rāje, ḍhol mṛudang ru khanjarī bāje;
Koṭi Shiv jenu dhyān dhare chhe, koṭi Brahmā gnān kathe chhe;
title: Relo zākamzoḷ naval Rasiyā rang relo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-74: unknown

Category: Shri Harina Pad
